metadata.dc:description: During the last years we have witnessed an increasing development of imaging techniques applied in Cardiology. Among them, cardiac computed tomography is an emerging and evolving technique. With the current possibility of very low radiation studies, the applications have expanded and go further coronariography In the present article we review the technical developments of cardiac computed tomography and its new applications.
metadata.dc:subject: Non invasive coronariography
Tomografía computarizada cardiaca
Cardiac computed tomography
España
Coronariografía no invasiva
Spain
metadata.dc:title: Tomografía computarizada cardiaca: Nuevas aplicaciones de una técnica en evolución.
[Cardiac computed tomography: new applications of an evolving technique].
